lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Ascensao said the court ruling stated that EPAC's participation in the public tenders violated the clauses of Portugal's EC accession treaty dealing with the gradual dismantling of the state agency's import monopoly.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Traders said they believed the EC's Executive Commission was unlikely to get involved in the dispute, preferring to leave the case to be resolved as an internal Portuguese issue.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: It also said the participation of EPAC, which still controls the national grain storage and distribution network, was unfair competition to the private traders.
